title: Nurse Practitioner Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 2 weeks. I interviewed at New Horizons (Brookline, MA) in Apr 2022
Interview Descriptions: Met with 3 people who did not introduce themselves or indicate their role.  The 2 physicians did all of the talking.  One was very new, the other had been there for a while. Reviewed information that was posted on the web site.  Neither physician was listed on the web site.
Interview Questions: Was I willing to work at multiple sites?

title: Human Resources Interview
Interview Descriptions: Non-profit organization discriminates based on where u live.  I was only asked if the commute would work for me.  This is not a bona fide ques. and certainly falls under DOL definition of discrimination.
Interview Questions: Does the commute work for you for this position?

title: Finance Department Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at New Horizons
Interview Descriptions: Easy first interview but the second interview they lowballed my modest offer and informed me the full time job I applied to was only a temp position.  I declined, 2 weeks later I get a call that ‘they’re going in a different direction and no longer considering me as a candidate’.  I’m Glad With my decision
Interview Questions: Where do you see yourself in 5 years?

title: Supervisor Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at New Horizons in Jan 2019
Interview Descriptions: it was great the person that interviewed me was very informative and helpful. she seemed to like what she was doing and this was a pleasure to see! the interview was a little long but she really answered all my questions
Interview Questions: why I want to work there

title: Help Desk Technician Interview
Application Type: I applied in-person. The process took 5 days. I interviewed at New Horizons (Spokane, WA) in Apr 2013
Interview Descriptions: straightforward.  Talked about my Previous work experience working with computers and people and how I got along. I talked about all the Applications that I taught and used on a daily basis.  I showed  simple presentation that I put together using the microsoft office products.
Interview Questions: what is one of your best jobs and what did you learn from it.
